## Security Vulnerability Report

**⚠️ IMPORTANT: For security vulnerabilities, please email security@stashtab.app instead of creating a public issue.**

If you prefer to use GitHub, you can use GitHub's [private vulnerability reporting](https://github.com/TRC-Crypto/stashtab/security/advisories/new).

A clear description of the security vulnerability.

- [ ] High - Should be addressed soon
